`material_code` = #{set.materialCode},
`material_name` = #{set.materialName},
`material_specs` = #{set.materialSpecs},
`material_unit` = #{set.materialUnit},
`supplier_code` = #{set.supplierCode},

`material_id` in
#{item} and
